  "Sanction Details" : "CAN NOT DO BUSINESS IN THE STATE OF LOUISIANA WITHOUT BEING REGISTERED AS AN AGENT.",
  "Broker Comment" : "I BASICALLY RECEIVED AN IN BOUND CALL AS THE \"BROKER OF THE  DAY\" AND HELD A CONVERSATION WITH A POSSIBLE INVESTOR LOOKING FOR INFORMATION ON A PARTICULAR STOCK.
